slides.title: Geolocation
bullets: Position relative to the equator, positive for north, negative for south
Position relative to the Meridian that passes through Greenwich (London), positive for east, negative for west

slides.title: Geolocation API
bullets: Not formally an HTML5 specification, but that's not important
Available in all modern browsers (latest version)
Always require the consent of the user
No specific control over method used, just high or not high accuracy

slides.title: Request the current location
bullets: A function to be called when location is known
A function to be called when an error occurs
Settings in the form of an object with properties

slides.title: Location result
bullets: The called function receives a single argument with
result.timestamp for the time when the location was read
accuracy is position accuracy in meters
altitude is meters above sea level, if available
altitudeAccuracy is zero if altitude is not supported
speed is movement in meters per second, if available

slides.title: Geo calculations
bullets: Not as simple as using pythagoras theorem since earth is not flat
Bearing (direction) to get from one location to another
Specified in 0-360 degrees, where 0 is north, 90 is east etc
The sun's movement over the sky
Can be determined from location and the time of year

slides.title: Continuous location updates
bullets: First of all, always a good strategy to retry getCurrentPosition if timed out
If you want continuous updates about position

slides.title: Map services
bullets: Access to maps from a (mobile) web browser

slides.title: HTML5 Canvas Element
bullets: New element that gives you pixel control of what is drawn
Everything inside a canvas element must be drawn with JavaScript instructions

slides.title: Draw filled objects on the canvas
bullets: fillStyle - The color of filled objects drawn on the canvas
fillRect - Draw a filled rectangle on the canvas

slides.title: Draw lines on the canvas
bullets: beginPath, moveTo, lineTo, closePath - Specify lines to be drawn
strokeStyle - The color of drawn lines
lineWidth - The thickness of drawn lines
stroke - Draw the lines for the currently defined path

slides.title: Create image from canvas
bullets: The result of a canvas can be used as an image in other parts of the page

slides.title: Animations on canvas
bullets: There is no built in animation support for whatever is shown on the canvas
In order to animate things on the canvas, you need to erase and repaint
